item.title: Getting started with extjs6
item.description: ExtJS 6 Application Setup # Getting started with Ext JS 6. Prerequisite steps: Download Sencha Cmd 6 and install it with sencha command set in environment path variables. Download trail version of Sencha SDK (ext-6.2.1.zip) and unzip it.(on location D:\ext-6.2.1) System is ready to create Extjs 6 application. Create sample application (World) with Extjs 6 standard folder structure There are three type of Application: Universal (Runs on Mobile webSencha touch and Desktop webSencha Extjs)
